sn4.12:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn4.12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava mahatiya parisaya parivuto dhammam deseti.
sn4.12:2.2: “ayam kho samano gotamo mahatiya parisaya parivuto dhammam deseti.
sn4.12:2.3: Yannunaham yena samano gotamo tenupasankameyyam vicakkhukammaya”ti.
sn4.12:2.4: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.12:5.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
